how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;Journalling;Task and project management (including CRMs);As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content)
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: Yes, and I am the only editor/administrator of my wiki(s)
putting it all together, what value does: Note taking, incredibly flexible tool. Using it on daily basis, no other tool comes near to the TW functionality I need, use and appreciate.
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I have customised TiddlyWiki through options and plugins;I am comfortable writing filter expressions;I have written custom CSS styles

what are we doing well? prompts for thin: Covering obvious and not so obvious note-taking needs, and above all I appreciate the things are documented because I have no trouble to understand and follow up the documentation if and when I need to resolve something.
what could we do better? prompts for thi:
Could you imagine yourself leaving TiddlyWiki? No way, it is absolutely essential tool for myself. 

Thank You!
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
